## Código

```{.r}
X <- ...
X <- purrr::map(X, function(x) (x - mean(x)) / sd(x))
C <- t(X) * X
```

#| label: fig-polar

    theme_minimal() +
    theme(
        text = element_text(size = 14),
        axis.title.y = element_text(margin = margin(0, 6, 0, 0, "pt"))
    ) +
    scale_color_viridis_d()
